description.value:
Accordions provide collapsible sections in your content to reduce vertical space while providing a
way of organizing and grouping information.

### Heading element
Accordions require the `header` slot to be populated e.g. with the `dct-heading` component allowing
the display of accordion title and optional icon elements. The heading record acts a button controlling
expannd and collapse events.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If true, the accordion is in a disabled state

attributes.name: divider
attributes.description: If set to `full` or `partial`, displays a divider or separator line for the accordion

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: If true, the accordion is in an expanded state.

description.value:
AccordionController

The Accordion Controller is a container for Accordion instances. It manages the state of child Accordions allowing the following;

- Accordions to be placed in a disabled
- Allowing single or multiple (all) Accordions to be expanded

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Places all child Accordion elements is into a disabled/enabled state

attributes.name: display-multiple
attributes.description:
Allows multilple Accordion elements be in an expanded state. If set to false,
the first expanded Accordion element will remain expanded all subsequent
Accordion's will be places in a collapsed state

description.value:
Button

Basic button component with optional ripple effect.

Work in progress!!

* They may display text or icons.

attributes.name: aria-label
attributes.description: Optional aria label for button

attributes.name: button-color
attributes.description: The Buttons's type. Default 'button'

attributes.name: button-style
attributes.description: The Buttons's type. Default 'button'

attributes.name: button-type
attributes.description: The Buttons's type. Default 'button'

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Button in an disabled state. Default false.

attributes.name: icon-button
attributes.description: Is button for display of icons only. Default false

attributes.name: ripple
attributes.description: Ripple effect enabled for button. Defult false

description.value:
Card
Display content and actions about a single subject. Card contents can include anything
from images to headlines, supporting text, buttons, and lists

Cards and created from title, subtitle and content elements and have been broken into
multiple components to support this structure.

attributes.name: border
attributes.description:
The Card's border style. Solid, elevated or none.
Default elevated, shadow style border.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
Card is in a disabled state. Setting this state will also set the disabled property
of any child components

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Contains a URL or URL fragment. If this property is set, card an anchor tag will be rendered

attributes.name: ripple
attributes.description: Ripple effect enabled for card. Defult true

attributes.name: target
attributes.description:
Applies when a href value is provided. It contains the target value to display the linked URL
Default value _blank;

description.value:
Card Content
Display content and actions about a single subject. Card contents can include anything
from images to headlines, supporting text, buttons, and lists

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Card is in an disabled state

description.value:
Card Titke
Display content and actions about a single subject. Card contents can include anything
from images to headlines, supporting text, buttons, and lists

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If true, the card title is in a disabled state

attributes.name: overlay
attributes.description:
If true, the card title will be in an overaly state. Primarily for use
when the parent Card is displaying an Image only allowin the title
to be displayed on top of the image

description.value:
Carousel's show a collection of items that can be scrolled/swiped on and off the screen and have the
follwowing features
* Contain visual items like images or video, along with optional label text
* Items change size as they move through the carousel with small leading/trailing items indicating that there is more content available
* Optional controls on the top left or bottom right allow the Carousel to display all content using full screen  grid layout

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Carousel is it a disabled state. Default false

attributes.name: display-all
attributes.description:
If true, the carousel is in an display all state and all Carousel cards will be displayed
in a grid layout

attributes.name: footer-text
attributes.description:
Optional text to display in Carousels footer element determine if
all carousel cards are visible

attributes.name: header-text
attributes.description:
Optional text to display in Carousels header element determine if
all carousel cards are visible

attributes.name: divider
attributes.description: How the divider element displayed.

description.value:
Item are elements that can contain text, links or any other native elements and should
be used as rows by the List or Accordion components.

If the Item is of type link, the Item will be defined as an anchor tag.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Item is in a disabled state. If of type link, click events will be disabled.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Used if type link. In this case the is defined as an anchor element and requires the href value

attributes.name: separator
attributes.description: Determines the bottom border should be displayed if Item is not the last element in a List or According .

attributes.name: target
attributes.description:
Used if type link. In this case the is defined as an anchor element and requires the target value
Default value _blank;

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Type of item content, link or text

description.value:
ItemHeading are elements used to describe the contents of a List or an Accordion and should only be
used once at the top of a List or Accordion component.

attributes.name: animate-icons
attributes.description: If true, animate the icon elementsicons in start and end slots

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: ItemHeading is in a disabled state

attributes.name: rotate-icon
attributes.description: * If true, icon is in a rotated state

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: List is in a disabled state

attributes.name: heading
attributes.description: Optional list heading
